Package Model.Rules

Class SevenoRules

java.lang.Object
Model.Rules.UnoGameRules
Model.Rules.SevenoRules
public class SevenoRules extends UnoGameRules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of the seven-o game mode of UNO.
In this game mode when someone plays a 7, he chooses a Player to swap hands with,
while when someone plays a 0, the players swap their hand with the next player following the direction of the turn
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SevenoRules()
    Creates a new SevenoRules with the classic cards per player and cards playable,
    while the deck is made of the classic deck composition (spicified in ClassicRules) with 1 more zero and 2 more seven for each Color.

    Description
    ActionPerformResult
    cardActionPerformance(Options parameters)
    Performs the classic actions associated with the Card, adding the action of the 7 and 0 Card:
    - with a 7, the current Player chooses a player to swap hands with; - with a 0, the players swap their hand with the next player following the direction of the turn.

    • cardActionPerformance

      public ActionPerformResult cardActionPerformance(Options parameters)
      Performs the classic actions associated with the Card, adding the action of the 7 and 0 Card:
      - with a 7, the current Player chooses a player to swap hands with; - with a 0, the players swap their hand with the next player following the direction of the turn. If the ActionPerformResult is SUCCESSFUL, then the turn is skipped, because the Player can't play other cards.
      Overrides:
      cardActionPerformance in class UnoGameRules
      Parameters:
      parameters -
      Returns:
      the ActionPerformResult of the operation

    • swapHand

      private Stack<Card> swapHand(Stack<Card> handToGiveAway, Player playerToSwapWith)
      Gives the hand to the Player to swap cards with, and returns his now old hand
      Parameters:
      handToGiveAway - the hand to give
      playerToSwapWith - the player to receive the new hand
      Returns:
      the old hand of the player
